Documentation.UserDocu: This class handles document objects in group
Create and add an object with given type and name to the group.

addObject( object ) Add an object to the group.
:param object: object to add to the group :type object: :class`FreeCAD.DocumentObject` :rtype: None

removeObject( object ) Remove an object from the group.
:param object: object to add to the group :type object: :class`FreeCAD.DocumentObject` :rtype: None

removeObjectsFromDocument() Remove all child objects from the group and document.
:rtype: None

getObject( name ) Return the object with the given name.
:param name: Name of the object :param type: string :rtype: None

hasObject( object ) Checks if the group has a given object.
:param object: object to be checked for :type object: :class`FreeCAD.DocumentObject` :rtype: None
